content.question: Which of the following statements about Africans brought as slaves to the British North American colonies is true?

choices.label: They were the primary labor source for plantations in the Chesapeake by 1630.
They had a much lower life expectantly in the Chesapeake than in South Carolina or the West Indies.
They greatly outnumbered Europeans in every colony south of the Mason-Dixon Line by 1776.
They maintained cultural practices brought from Africa.
They were the primary labor source in Pennsylvania until 1720.

content.answer: They maintained cultural practices brought from Africa.
